testcase.name: TC_03_addUserData

error.message:
Don't know how to encode {"accountno":"TA-Aug2207","departmnetno":"1","pincode":"124124","salary":"12000"} as a byte stream.
Please use EncoderConfig (EncoderConfig#encodeContentTypeAs) to specify how to serialize data for this content-type. For example: "given().config(RestAssured.config().encoderConfig(encoderConfig().encodeContentTypeAs("appplication/json", ContentType.TEXT))). .."
